content.text:
# Draft:Wargrave (band)

Wargrave was a South African thrash metal band from Cape Town, South Africa. The band started out primarily as a thrash metal band and slowly started to incorporate more of a hybrid approach by adding hints of technical death metal and melodic death metal..
Recognition & awards
In 2016, Wargrave was awarded the South African Metal Music Award (SAMMA) for Best Thrash Metal Band, and was also the runner-up for Album of the Year with their debut album "Suffering the Void".
Notable performances
Wargrave's most notable performances are Metal4Africa's Summerfest 2016, Metal4Africa's Winterfest 2013, Rock the River 2012, Metal4Africa's Summerfest 2012, Rock the River 2011
Members
Final line-up
* Heinrich Kollner – vocals
* Justin Ross – guitars
* Brendan Stubbs – guitars
* Eugene Havenga – bass
* Jason Jardim – drums
Former or recording members
* Julian Brusser - drums
* Chris Hall - vocals
* Lourens Meyer - drums
* Jacques Jansen van Rensburg – bass (recording on Suffering the Void)
Discography
* Suffering the Void (2015, Burning Tone)
